code: export var BASE_URL="https://auth.nomoreparties.co";var checkServerStatus=function checkServerStatus(res){return res.ok?res.json():Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));};export var registration=function registration(password,email){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(checkServerStatus);};export var authorization=function authorization(password,email){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(checkServerStatus);};export var checkTokenValidity=function checkTokenValidity(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:"GET",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(checkServerStatus);};
